name: TOTALLY ORDINARY COWBOY RUNNER | Pre-Alpha
description:
Totally Ordinary Cowboy Runner, as evident by its name, is an endless runner, where You take the role of a cowboy. 

You are equipped with a weapon and a soul-converter, which extracts Vrotjebit out of enemies' souls. As you collect enough Vrotjebit, you can use the soul converter to summon bosses and open space-shifts that take you to different places of the world. 

The game takes place on the continent known as Abserika, which is surrounded by the Un-Unsailable Ocean.


Map of Abserika

 

The continent is divided between four countries: 

  • Ice Domain of the North
  • United States of Abserika
  • Bugsico 
  • Isles of Bjik

You start the game inside the USA, in the Srojave desert, and then make your way all around the continent. All locations are locked in few tiers, with each next tier being more difficult than the last one, and the tiers are unlocked by upgrading the soul converter with the collected vrotjebit.

[IMPORTANT] Development Status

The game is still in development, and lacks a lot of features and content. Game will be constantly updated and polished up until and after the full release on PC and mobile devices. 

All feedback is appreciated, and I will do my best to find time to personally respond to all of it. 

All the already released features will be marked in a list below. All features that are not yet added to the game will be posted in devlogs when they are implemented, as well as marked as [DONE] on this page.

Game's Features
  • [DONE] Infinitely Spawning levels and enemies
  • [DONE] Changing zones
  • [DONE] Summoning the boss
  • [DONE] First Boss
  • [DONE] Leaderboard
  • [DONE] Collecting and saving currency
  • [DONE] First five zones
  • [IN DEVELOPMENT] Character Customization and Upgrades
  • [IN DEVELOPMENT] Inventory Display
  • [IN DEVELOPMENT] More Bosses
  • [IN DEVELOPMENT] More Zones
  • [IN DEVELOPMENT] Improve UI
  • [IN DEVELOPMENT] Bestiary with info on the enemies as well as world's lore
  • [IN DEVELOPMENT] More/Better Music and Sound Effects
  • [IN DEVELOPMENT] Fixing bugs/ Improving Player Experience/ Making the game BETTER :>
